titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation declaring His Maiesties royall grace and pleasure, to confirme to his subiects their defectiue estates in their lands and possessions, by his commission lately renewed and enlarged to that purpose.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: And by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Court at Oatlands, the foure and twentieth day of August, in the eleuenth yeere of Our Reigne of England, Scotland, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: And
